description: This tender refers to the purchase of 2600 cases of Vegetarian/Kosher/Halal rations that must be certified Kosher, Haram Halal, and Dhabiha Halal.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Vegetarian/Kosher/Halal Rations Contract Announcement**

### Reference/Titre
Reference Number: **cb-929-49613198**
Title/Titre (English): Vegetarian/Kosher/Halal Rations
Title/Titre (French): Rations végétariennes/casher/halal

### Important Dates
*   Publication Date: **2023-09-25**
*   Tender Closing Date: **2023-10-10T14:00:00**
*   Expected Contract Start Date: **2023-12-14**
*   Expected Contract End Date: **2023-01-24**

### Contract Details
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking suppliers to provide prepared and preserved food items that meet specific dietary requirements. The contract is for the supply of 2600 cases of Vegetarian/Kosher/Halal rations that meet strict certification standards.

*   Each item must be: 
    *   Certified kosher by a kashruth agency approved by the Organization of Orthodox Kashruth Supervision.
    *   Certified halal and Dhabiha halal, meeting Islamic halal standards established by the Islamic Food and Nutrition Council of America (IFANCA).

The government currently owns Reference Number: **16816-59994** or equivalent item, which is owned by **My Own Meals INC**. 

### Contracting Entity
*   Contracting Entity: **National Defence**
*   Contracting Entity Address: **101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2**

### Trade Agreements
This contract falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and aims to promote international trade.

### Regions of Opportunity
This tender announcement is open to **World** regions.

### Point of Contact
*   Name: **Paige Morris**
*   Email: **paige.morris@forces.gc.ca**
*   Phone: (343) 552-7713

### Attachments
[Download documents from the Canadabuys Portal](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20433/23sp0k-acan-en.pdf for English or Français version)

### Additional Information
Bidders are advised to carefully read the tender documents and contact the point of contact if any clarification is needed.
